attributes.action: Druid faith part of national curriculum taught at schools
attributes.additional_details: We need in these modern times, the recognition that schools in UK must give students an alternative religion to Christianity and Muslim...so I would like the Druid faith taught in schools with the possibility of including other faiths such as Buddism, paganism etc. This will give children a well rounded and informed religious education so they are able to make there own minds up to beliefs and faiths.
